page.title: 15South Staffs Sixes 1985
page.content: The South Staffs football 6s took place at St.John's School,Swindon on 27th April 1985.The teams taking part were St.John's,Bobbington,St.Christopher's, St.Mary's and St.Bernadette's.It started at 10.00 and the first match was St.John's v St.Bernadette's.At half time St.John's were 2-0 up.Robert Turner and David Watt scored the goals but the final score was 2-2.Bobbington then beat St.Bernadette's 1-0 and St.John's beat Bobbington 3-1. In group 2 St.Christopher's beat St.Mary's 1-0. In the semi-finals St.John's beat St.Mary's 2-0 and Bobbington beat St.Christopher's 1-0(aet). St.John's beat Bobbington 6-0 in the final with David Watt scoring 5.The trophy,which had been donated by Swindon Parish Council,medals and certificates were presented by Parish Council chairman Mr.E.Williams.
